sqlMap.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.categoryId FROM hobby a WHERE 1=1 and a.TITLE LIKE '%'||#title#||'%' LIMIT #query_start#,#query_number#

/*select read Hobby*/ SELECT a.id, a.title, a.categoryId FROM hobby a WHERE 1=1 and a.ID = #id#
and a.TITLE = #title# and a.CATEGORYID = #categoryId#
sqlMap.insert: /* insert Hobby*/ INSERT INTO hobby(title, categoryId) VALUES (#title#, #categoryId#)
sqlMap.delete:
/*delete Hobby*/ delete FROM hobby WHERE 1=1 and ID = #id#
and TITLE = #title# and CATEGORYID = #categoryId#
